result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nicholas John Kastner

records.addlTxt:
1:25 PM Nicholas John Kastner appears via zoom,  Atty Joel Kenneth Larimore appears via zoom, ADA Kaley Walker for the State of Wisconsin. Information filed with the Court. DE waives further reading of the Information. Defendant pleas NG. Court confirms address and phone number. ADA Walker is requesting a STC in November to convey an offer, DE and Atty Larimore would like that set a little further out. DE plans on retaining new counsel. Court adjourned at 1:30 pm.
Status conference scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on December 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
filed by ADA Kaley Walker. eif

1:59 PM Nicholas John Kastner appears via zoom,  Atty Joel Kenneth Larimore appears via zoom,  ADA Kaley Walker for the State of Wisconsin. State is ready to proceed. Atty Larimore breaks to speak with DE. Atty Larimore states this will be a waiver but would like to schedule an ARGN. Court finds DE freely, intelligently and knowingly waives constitutional right to a preliminary hearing. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DE probably committed a felony. Court binds DE over for further proceedings. DE will be out of custody 11/25/22. ADA Walker is requesting the DE appear via zoom for the ARGN. Zoom approved. Court adjourned at 2:09 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Arraignment on October 20, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

4:03 PM Nicholas John Kastner does not appear in Court,  Atty Joel Kenneth Larimore appeared in court,  ADA Kaley Walker appeared for the State of Wisconsin. ADA Walker states DE is incarcerated in the Ramsey County Workhouse and asking the DE be able to appear via zoom for the 8/30/22 PH. Court approves zoom. Court adjourned at 4: pm.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 30, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
from Ct Comm Gavic to SPD letter "The Hearing is to be conducted as scheduled, but as a status conf. Atty. Larimore may attend via tele. should he so choose. JRG"
from SPD requesting the preliminary hearing be rescheduled with Atty Larimore.
Joel Larimore
Preliminary hearing on August 26, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Nicholas John Kastner
Current: 553 Ohio Street, Saint Paul, MN 55107   (Effective: 07-12-2022)
Prior: 877 White Bear Avenue, Saint Paul, MN 55106 
per DE in court. eif
Court finds Defendant freely, intelligently, knowingly, and understandingly made and waives constitutional right to those time requirements.
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: NO CONTACT WHATSOEVER WITH K. JORGENSON, J.K.B., T.L.E. OR THE STORAGE UNITS ON 902nd STREET.
DE from PCJ

4:01 PM Defendant Nicholas John Kastner appears from Jail via video, Atty Atty K. Dipallito appears by phone, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin. DE does qualify for PD.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Defendant understands charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Schieffer is requesting a $25,000.00 w/conditions of no contact w/ K.J., JKB, or the Storage Units on 902nd St River Falls WI., no objection. Court so orders. Waive the time limits. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 4:10 pm.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
9:49 AM Defendant Nicholas John Kastner does not appear in Court, DA Halle E. Hatch appears for the State of Wisconsin. State is requesting a Adj. States warrant. Court authorizes warrant.
Defendant's Summons/Complaint. Return to Sender. Unable to forward.
